entry.title: Exploring grha bhedams
entry.content:
Here is a demo web app for exploring rāgās and their bhēdams.

A few weeks ago, I had a conversation with Mr. Ramesh who showed me some amazing Excel wizardry and spells he'd cast to be able to take a raga and ask questions about its grha bhēdams. I hadn't realized until then that the question of what the scales of ragas turn into when you do bhēdams on them (grha or śruti bhēdam) is of interest to musicians. So I resurrect a rāgā database that I'd scraped off Wikipedia's Janya Rāgās some 4 years ago and make a bhēdam explorer web app.

Have fun!
